title: How to Call Chime Customer Service (& Get Help From a Real Person)

steps.title: Chime's customer service phone number is 1-844-244-6363.
steps.content: Chime's customer service phone number is 1-844-244-6363. Chime's customer service department is open 24 hours a day, 7 days a week. When you call, you can speak to a live representative. [1] X Research source Chime's customer service can help you with a number of things, from quick questions about your accounts to deleting your account entirely.

steps.title: Live chat.
steps.content: Live chat. You can speak to a live representative via Chime's live chat in the Chime mobile app. Simply open the Chime app and tap the chat icon at the top of the screen, which looks like a speech bubble with a question mark. Just like Chime's phone number, representatives are available 24/7 to help you.

steps.title: Social media.
steps.content: Social media. Chime has Facebook , X/Twitter , and Instagram accounts. You can contact Chime via these social media accounts either by sending a direct message on X/Twitter or Instagram , mentioning them , or posting directly on their page (on Facebook).
